sections.title: Description
sections.raw_content: Error.Msg is a function that returns the error message related to a specified error code. If the error code is eNoError, or if there is no such error code, it returns the empty string. If there is such an error, it returns the textual message associated with that error.
sections.mdown_content: **Error.Msg** is a function that returns the error message related to a specified error code. If the error code is *eNoError*, or if there is no such error code, it returns the empty string. If there is such an error, it returns the textual message associated with that error.

sections.title: Example
sections.raw_content: This program prints out the error message associated with eFsysFileNotFound (“File not found”).
sections.mdown_content: This program prints out the error message associated with *eFsysFileNotFound* (File not found).

sections.title: Status
sections.raw_content:
Exported qualified.

This means that you can only call the function by calling Error.Msg, not by calling Msg.
sections.mdown_content:
Exported qualified.
This means that you can only call the function by calling **Error.Msg**, not by calling **Msg**.
